p: Resveratrol also possesses anti-angiogenic effects, manifested via GSK3beta/beta-catenin/TCF-dependent pathway downregulation and VEFG inhibition [ 129]. Furthermore, this phytochemical is a potent antioxidant. Increased production of free oxygen radicals and low levels of glutathione peroxidase (GSH-Px) and SOD characterize endometriosis. After the supplementation with resveratrol, it was reported that the increased peritoneal levels of free oxygen radicals were suppressed [ 130]. Moreover, resveratrol attenuated the oxidative stress via activating Nrf2/HO-1 pathway and decreasing the levels of HO-1, catalase (CAT), SOD, and GPx [ 131, 132].
